DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of two allergy drops for enhancing comfort and performance of contact lens wear
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of CL Wear Between Two Allergy Drops
DOC.detailed_description: Contact lens patients will instill allergy drops and subjective and objective tests will be performed
DOC.criteria: Males or females > 18 years old Mild to moderate dry eye symptoms Likely to complete all study visits and able to provide informed consent Current use of topical cyclosporine Known contraindications to any study medication or ingredients Active ocular diseases or uncontrolled systemic disease (blepharitis patients that are actively being treated or disease that is uncontrollable) Ocular surgery within the past 3 months
